key.name: app-id
key.description: The application ID used as a reference when launching in Quake mode

key.name: app-shortcut
key.description: Shortcut to activate the application in Quake mode

key.name: screen-edge
key.description: Which edge of the screen the window should appear from (top, bottom, left, right)

key.name: vertical-size
key.description: Specify the vertical size of the window

key.name: vertical-size-unit
key.description: Unit for vertical size: percent or pixels

key.name: horizontal-size
key.description: Specify the horizontal size of the window

key.name: horizontal-size-unit
key.description: Unit for horizontal size: percent or pixels

key.name: render-on-current-monitor
key.description: When enabled, the window will be shown on the Display that currently has the mouse pointer

key.name: render-on-primary-monitor
key.description: When enabled, the window will be shown on the Display set as Primary in Gnome Display settings

key.name: monitor-screen
key.description: Specify the display where the window should be rendered

key.name: auto-hide-window
key.description: When enabled, this hides the window when it loses focus

key.name: always-on-top
key.description: When enabled, window will appear on top of all other non-topmost windows

key.name: animation-time
key.description: Duration of the slide animation in milliseconds

key.name: skip-taskbar
key.description: When enabled, the window will not appear in overview mode or when using Alt+Tab.

key.name: launch-args-map
key.description: Dictionary mapping application IDs to their launch arguments
